channel.title: Israel-Gaza Conflict on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Israel-Gaza Conflict on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Regina Spektor to Pro-Palestine Protesters at Her Concert: “You’re Just Yelling at a Jew”
item.description: “This is not the place for that conversation, I’m a real person who came here to play music,” Spektor told the crowd.

item.title: Regina Spektor to Pro-Palestine Protesters at Her Concert: “You’re Just Yelling at a Jew”
item.description: “This is not the place for that conversation, I’m a real person who came here to play music,” Spektor told the crowd.

item.title: Outrage-Sparking BBC Doc Following Children in Gaza Breached Accuracy Guideline, Review Finds
item.description: The public broadcaster came under fire in February when one of the 13-year-old subjects in the film, a young boy called Abdullah Al-Yazouri, was found to be the son of a Hamas official.

item.title: Outrage-Sparking BBC Doc Following Children in Gaza Breached Accuracy Guideline, Review Finds
item.description: The public broadcaster came under fire in February when one of the 13-year-old subjects in the film, a young boy called Abdullah Al-Yazouri, was found to be the son of a Hamas official.
